column4: ok so what is the ubuntu-standard package, if i mark the x86 memtest for removal it says the standard pkg must be removed as well, but what else uses the standard package?,,,when a pakcage starts with the name ubuntu, or contains the word STANDARD i get a little worried bout messin with it
its description says " This package depends on all of the packages in the Ubuntu standard system" sooo, what's taht ??
Why are you worried about default entries? Normally you dont need to mess with those.
